message: When the barrier falls, Ren is standing there, looking at me with sad eyes.
The rage from before is gone.
Finally, I can face him. The real him.
After a moment, Ren speaks.

name: 蓮
message: "We've been together since the beginning. I've watched over you all this time."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Yeah."

name: 蓮
message: "That's why I was born. It was my job to keep you safe, to keep your mind in balance."

name: 蓮
message: "But as you became more and more unstable, my voice stopped reaching you."
He's talking about my wild years, when I fought in Rhyme. I made Granny worry so much back then... I guess it wasn't easy on Ren, either.

name: 蓮
message: "I was worried what might happen if you lost control completely."

name: 蓮
message: "But as long as I was inside you, I was helpless. I couldn't reach you in the real world."

name: 蓮
message: "But then, when I was at my most desperate... that was when you found an Allmate."
An Allmate... Ren's vessel. I found him abandoned on the side of the road.

name: 蓮
message: "I realized this was an opportunity. When you register an Allmate, your mind and its mind are joined via your ID chip."

name: 蓮
message: "I transferred my consciousness to the Allmate. At last, I could interact with you in the real world."

name: 蓮
message: "So I did. As your Allmate, as Ren, I tried to protect you. I saw what you were doing in Rhyme. I wanted to stop you."

name: 蓮
message: "But then, something erased my memories."

name: 蓮
message: "When that happened, I forgot not only the Rhyme incidents, but also what I truly was."

name: 蓮
message: "For years, I believed that I really was an Allmate. But now, I remember everything―what I am, my true purpose. All because of that worm."

name: 蓮
message: "That worm was designed to fully activate an Allmate's emotional expression system."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Emotional expression system? I've never heard of anything like that."

name: 蓮
message: "No one knows about it, but all Allmates have had it since the start."
Then it's Toue's doing. Of course.
That bug Noiz mentioned must be related.

name: 蓮
message: "When the Allmates' emotions awakened, so did my memories... together with feelings I had never known."

name: 蓮
message: "I'd synchronized too deeply with the Allmate body."

name: 蓮
message: "The Allmate's emotional expression system caused me to develop emotions as well."

name: 蓮
message: "I could no longer be Ren or what I had been―not truly."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What do you mean?"

name: 蓮
message: "The first emotions I felt made me suffer. I... Ren was an old model. It's abilities were... inferior."

name: 蓮
message: "I was jealous of the newer models. I grew terrified that one day you would abandon me, trade me in."

name: 蓮
message: "Perhaps those were Ren's feelings more than my own. Either way..."

name: 蓮
message: "Each new thing I felt gave birth to another, and another... until finally, I was forced to face the fact... that I wanted you all to myself."

name: 蓮
message: "I didn't want to let anyone else have you. I wanted to be with you―not just to protect you, but to share my heart with you. To become your equal."

name: 蓮
message: "I came to the conclusion that those desires were too far a departure from my proper role. But even knowing that, I couldn't change how I felt."

name: 蓮
message: "Torn between my feelings and my duty, I opted to pick neither."

name: 蓮
message: "I decided to make you reject me. I thought that if you rejected me strongly enough, I might vanish from inside you altogether."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So that's why you ran away?"
Ren falls silent.
It's a lot to take in...
More than surprise, though... I feel anger.
I mean, what an idiot.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Man, you're such a dumbass."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You spent all this time inside me. Shouldn't you know me better than anyone?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Did you really think pushing me away a few times would make me hate you?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why do you think I kept fixing you up? Why I kept using you even though you were obsolete? It's because I care about you, stupid."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That's why I fixed you when you broke. Why even when parts were hard to find, I kept looking until I got what you needed."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I did it all because you're important to me! I don't want a new model. I never did."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Now, I dunno what kind of feelings you have for me or whatever, but could they really be that bad?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Is it really so wrong to feel something for me?"

name: 蓮
message: "...It directly contradicts the purpose of my existence. My duty is to maintain your mental balance, but I've become a disruptive influence."

name: 蓮
message: "I can't exist like this. Your mind and body can't sustain the conflict I represent. Sooner or later, I'll disappear."
I don't even want to think about that.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You can't. I won't let you. You're me, aren't you? Don't I get a say?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You've helped me through so much. I couldn't have done it without you."

name: 蓮
message: "Even without me, you'll still have Ren. The Allmate will return to factory settings. You can keep using it as you always have."

name: 蓮
message: "You don't need me, Aoba."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You're not listening! I don't care how well it functions! Get it through your thick skull!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I need you, Ren. You, not an Allmate. I want us to be together."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But you're just gonna leave me?"

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba..."

name: 蓮
message: "I'm very happy that you feel that way, but..."
Ren looks down at his feet, lips drawn into a tight line.
Words aren't going to be enough.
So I walk up to him, reach out, and pull him into my embrace.

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'll say it as many times as it takes. I don't want you to leave. I need you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Stay with me."
This time, when I look up, I see Ren's expression change. Longing swirls in the depths of his eyes.
Slowly, timidly, he raises his hand to touch my cheek... and then, he squeezes me tight.
We're only data in this world, so it's just the illusion of touch.
But despite that, Ren's skin feels real beneath my hands.
I can feel his warmth where our bodies touch.
Ren hugs me back with surprising force. Though it's a little hard to breathe, it makes me happy.
It tells me just how strong his feelings for me are. I hug him back every bit as tight.
In this moment, we are together. And that means more to me than anything.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren, promise me something. Promise me you'll never think about leaving, ever again."

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Promise me."

name: 蓮
message: "...Alright."
Ren buries his face into my shoulder.

name: 蓮
message: "Alright, Aoba. I promise."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Good."
I slowly pull away and meet Ren's gaze.
His amber eyes twinkle softly.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Come on, let's go. Everyone's waiting."

name: 蓮
message: "Right."
I take Ren's hands. We exchange a nod, then the both of us close our eyes.
I focus my mind, and the two of us leap.
Higher... higher...
In my mind's eye, I see the ceiling shatter... and beyond it is...

name: ナイン
message: "....d of, so... world."

name: ナイン
message: "...rry. ...can ...always be destroy..."

name: ナイン
message: "...it, and... world... endless..."
